zh_title:
[模组] 框架
已知问题
zh_content: - PC Game Pass 玩家：版本号识别的问题已在框架 3.0.6.1 版本中修复。 提醒：目前 PC Game Pass 版本已更新到 v1.3，可以使用最新版本的模组了。 - 社交页（Social Page）：目前在同时安装了恋爱与结婚（Lovers）和社交页（Social Page）时创建新游戏会导致游戏崩溃，且未结婚的存档可能会被强制结婚，建议暂时删除社交页（Social Page）。 此处指的是社交页（Social Page）而非社交与礼物（Social and Gifts）。 - 恋爱与结婚（Lovers）：读取存档时床位配置会出现清空的问题已在 v1.2.7 修复。 - 社交和礼物（Social and Gifts）：显示礼物偏好的功能偶现失效的问题已在 v1.2.5 修复。 - 自定义文本（Custom Text）：目前该模组存在游戏更新，游戏原本的文本发生变更后，模组内的文本不会同步更新的问题，建议暂时移除。
en_content: - For PC Game Pass Players: The issue with version number detection has been fixed in Framework 3.0.6.1. Reminder: The current PC Game Pass version has been updated to v1.3, and the latest version of the module can be used. - Social Page: Currently, if you install both "Lovers" and "Social Page", creating a new game will cause the game to crash, and unmarried saves may be forced to marry. It is recommended to temporarily delete "Social Page". Note that this refers to the "Social Page" instead of "Social and Gifts". - Lovers: The issue where the bed configuration would be cleared when loading a save has been fixed in v1.2.7. - Social and Gifts: The issue where the function of displaying gift preferences would occasionally fail has been fixed in v1.2.5. - Custom Text: Currently, this mod has an issue where after a game update, the text in the mod will not be updated synchronously after the original text of the game is changed. It is recommended to temporarily remove it.
